summary:
I felt it was wierd that there was no corpse due to hypothermia. (and other things)
this mod fixes that.
descriptionHtml:
Why :
-Skyrim is a cold and harsh land.
-Immersion
-Because

But why ? :
-With frostfall I can die of cold , so why not have others who did so
-there talk of racism and rejection in skyrim but nothing to show for it. with the mod you will find left overs of victims , sometimes its easy to work out what happened other times not so much. however there is allways a plot behind what happened.

But... dead kids :
Yeah kids can die , its true... and in ye old days kids died all the time , from bandits to darker figures so imagine in a world were trolls , monsters and other horros are real imagine how much death would happen. (you could be playing outside in cyrodiil and *BAM* oblivion gate !)
Credits :
I made the mod but BloodrendX001 help me a lot here. he corrected all my spelling errors (damned dyslexia ) and maid them more better to read. (give him some kudos please)

So whats in the mod ? :
Data , lots of 0s and 1s.

What content does the mod add to skyrim :
oh , dead corpes were you can either ignore them or work out what happened (no scripts just your own deduction)

Your sick ! :
I feel fine....
author: C0331 AKA privata and BloodrendX001
